param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre link text
param.description: Text to go before the Registration link.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post link text
param.description: Text to go after the Registration link.
